responsibilities.title: Key Responsibilities
responsibilities.template:
• Assist in the planning and execution of civil construction projects
• Conduct site inspections and ensure work is performed according to specifications
• Coordinate with subcontractors and site personnel
• Monitor project progress and report to the Project Manager
• Ensure compliance with safety regulations and site procedures
• Assist with the preparation of project documentation and reports

essential_requirements.title: Essential Requirements
essential_requirements.template:
• Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering or a related field
• Minimum of [Number] years of experience in civil construction projects
• Strong understanding of civil engineering principles and practices
• Ability to read and interpret engineering drawings and specifications
• Valid driver's license
• Construction Induction Card (White Card)

desirable_requirements.title: Desirable Requirements
desirable_requirements.template:
• Experience with specific civil works such as earthworks, drainage, or road construction
• Proficiency in project management software
• Excellent communication and problem-solving skills

responsibilities.title: Key Responsibilities
responsibilities.template:
• Manage and oversee electrical aspects of building and construction projects
• Develop and review electrical designs and specifications
• Liaise with clients, contractors, and other stakeholders
• Ensure projects are delivered on time, within budget, and to the required standards
• Provide technical support and guidance to the construction team
• Monitor and ensure compliance with relevant Australian standards and regulations

essential_requirements.title: Essential Requirements
essential_requirements.template:
• Bachelor's degree in Electrical Engineering
• Minimum of [Number] years of experience as an Electrical Engineer in the construction industry
• Strong knowledge of AS/NZS 3000 wiring rules and other relevant standards
• Experience in the design and implementation of electrical systems for commercial or industrial buildings
• Excellent project management and communication skills

desirable_requirements.title: Desirable Requirements
desirable_requirements.template:
• Chartered Professional Engineer (CPEng) status
• Experience with specific software such as AutoCAD or Revit
• Experience in renewable energy projects or building management systems
